OOC: Uh SkarBlaise never fired his weapons he only pointed and yelled because 
he covered a lot of territory I didn't feel it was fair for him to arrive and 
start shooting.  But now I'll shoot.

::SkarBlaise::
    He took the shots to the chest and was knocked back a few steps.  In 
return he fired a missile and one big strafing blast from his canon.
